result.arabic_text: وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُۥ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ بِغَيۡرِ ٱلۡحَقِّ وَظَنُّوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ إِلَيۡنَا لَا يُرۡجَعُونَ
result.translation: Firawuni hamwe n’ingabo ziwe baragize amanyama mu kugarariza Musa ata n’ukuri bisunze mu gihugu ca Misiri, baraheza bibaza ko nibapfa batazozuka bakagaruka iwacu Twebwe Allah.
